name: General J. Hamm Naval Base
abilities: This asset provides +2 command.

name: Vulcan Palisade
abilities: This asset cannot be bombarded. (Megastructures can still be bombarded)

name: Space Elevator
abilities: Constructed spacecraft may start in high-orbit

name: Nuclear Missile Silo
abilities: Spend 2 Command: Make an attack on a ship in orbit treating the attack delta-vee as 4 and the accuracy as 2.

name: Air-gapped systems
abilities: Espionage events affecting this asset cost 1 more command to play.

name: Experimental Quantum Transmitter
abilities: If you own Experimental Quantum Receiver on another asset then both assets receive +1 to all resource generation.

name: Experimental Quantum Receiver
abilities: If you own Experimental Quantum Transmitter on another asset then both this assets receive +1 to all resource generation.

name: Interplanetary Catapult Launcher
abilities: Your spacecraft in orbit around this asset only spend half the delta-vee to move to another asset.

name: Interplanetary Catapult Receiver
abilities: Spacecraft moving to this asset only spend half the delta-vee to do so.

name: Modular Construction Yards
abilities: This asset generates +2 construction when it generates construction

name: Interplanetary Broadcast Station
abilities: This asset provides +1 command

name: 0K Research Labs
abilities: This asset draws 1 more card when drawing cards.

name: Simulacrum Facility
abilities: Activate: You may look at one random card in your opponent's hand.

name: Reconstructive Modeller
abilities: When this asset takes damage, draw a card.

name: Synaptic Recycler
abilities: Activate: Place a card from your hand facedown in any orbit. That card is now debris.

name: Magnetospheric Manipulator
abilities: Activate: If there is debris around this asset, do 1 damage to target enemy spacecraft.

name: Excavated Core Computer
abilities: Subtract 1 from this asset's gravitational factor. It can't go below 1.

name: Osmium Shielded Circuitry
abilities: Add 1 to this asset's gravitational factor.

name: Logistical Kill Switch
abilities: If this asset is no longer under your control, it cannot be activated.

name: Hypertrophic Pacifier
abilities: Acitvate: Spacecraft in orbit around this asset cannot attack.
